name: Corridor (Armandval)
description: 3D FPP video game. It is a race against time in a maze to find a key and opened a door behind which hides a magnetic field which is the means of passage to the next stage. However, it is necessary to collect the batteries in order to avoid the exhaustion of the energy bar and also to collect the crystals to obtain a high number of points at the end of the course. The most difficult are the moving objects that must be avoided on the course.
